Command.label: Clip Command
Command.tooltip: The command used to create the clip

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

OnlyTriggerOffCommand.label: Only Trigger off the Command
OnlyTriggerOffCommand.tooltip: If enabled, videos triggered from pressing the hotkey will not playback on stream.

NotifyChatOfClips.label: Notify Chat About Clip Status
NotifyChatOfClips.tooltip: Put a message in chat about new clip being created and when completed

RequiredTriggerCount.label: Required Commands to Trigger
RequiredTriggerCount.tooltip: Number of commands required to trigger the clip

TriggerCooldown.label: Trigger Cooldown (seconds)
TriggerCooldown.tooltip: The time frame in which commands count to trigger a clip

CooldownMessageEnabled.label: Cooldown Notify
CooldownMessageEnabled.tooltip: Put a message in chat about command being on cooldown if activated during cooldown.

CooldownMessage.value: The command '$COMMAND' is currently on cooldown. Try again in $COOLDOWN seconds.
CooldownMessage.label: Cooldown Message
CooldownMessage.tooltip: Message format to display when the command is on cooldown.

VideoFrameCustomBackground.label: Clip Frame Border Custom Url
VideoFrameCustomBackground.tooltip: If you choose 'custom' this will be used for the image url.

ProgressBarFillColor.label: Progress Bar Fill Color
ProgressBarFillColor.tooltip: The Fill Color of the Progress Bar

ProgressBarBackgroundColor.label: Progress Bar Background Color
ProgressBarBackgroundColor.tooltip: The background color of the Progress Bar

TitleFontColor.label: Title Font Color
TitleFontColor.tooltip: The font foreground color for video title.

FontName.label: Font Name
FontName.tooltip: Font Name From Adobe Edge Fonts

CustomFontName.label: Custom Font Name
CustomFontName.tooltip: A custom font from Adobe Edge Fonts

OpenEdgeFontsUrl.label: Open Adobe Edge Fonts
OpenEdgeFontsUrl.tooltip: Opens Adobe Edge Fonts site to select fonts

InTransition.label: In Transition
InTransition.tooltip: Set how the alert transitions in

OutTransition.label: Out Transition
OutTransition.tooltip: Set how the alert transitions out

OpenCustomCSSFile.label: Edit Advanced CSS
OpenCustomCSSFile.tooltip: Opens custom.css file for advanced CSS editing

HotKey.label: Medal HotKey
HotKey.tooltip: This is the 'SendKeys' formatted hotkey for Medal

MedalPartnerRef.label: Partner Reference Name
MedalPartnerRef.tooltip: Your Medal Partner Reference Name. The part after 'ref=' in your partner url.

UsePositionVertical.label: Use Preset Vertical Position
UsePositionVertical.tooltip: If unchecked, the absolute positions will be used.

PositionVertical.label: Video Vertical Position (Preset)
PositionVertical.tooltip: The video vertical position.  If absolute is not -1, this is ignored.

UsePositionHorizontal.label: Use Preset Horizontal Position
UsePositionHorizontal.tooltip: If unchecked, the absolute positions will be used.

PlaybackSpeed.label: Playback Speed
PlaybackSpeed.tooltip: Set the playback speed of the clips

OpenOverlayPreview.label: Open Overlay In Browser
OpenOverlayPreview.tooltip: Open overlay in browser to test

PlayRandomVideo.label: Play Random Video
PlayRandomVideo.tooltip: Play an existing clip (randomly). You must have at least 1 clip

UseNonWatermarkedVideo.label: Use Non-Watermarked Videos
UseNonWatermarkedVideo.tooltip: If you provide a private api key, that was granted special access (see the form below), checking this box will enable non-watermarked videos.

PrivateApiKey.label: Private API Key (Optional)
PrivateApiKey.tooltip: Allows non-watermarked videos when using the 'Recent Clips' overlay

GeneratePrivateKey.label: Generate Private API Key
GeneratePrivateKey.tooltip: Link to generate a private key.

OpenSpecialPrivileges.label: Special Privileges Form
OpenSpecialPrivileges.tooltip: Fill out the form to get special privileges to have 'non-watermarked' clips.

RecentPlaybackSpeed.label: Playback Speed
RecentPlaybackSpeed.tooltip: Set the playback speed of the clips

RecentVolume.label: Video Volume
RecentVolume.tooltip: Sets the volume level for the video

RecentAutoStartVideo.label: Auto Play Clips
RecentAutoStartVideo.tooltip: Video will play automatically when the source is visible.

RecentMuteAudio.label: Mute Playback Audio
RecentMuteAudio.tooltip: Audio will be muted in video playback.

OpenOverlayRecents.label: Open Recent Clips Overlay In Browser
OpenOverlayRecents.tooltip: Open overlay in browser to test

RecentPlayBackPlay.label: PLAY
RecentPlayBackPlay.tooltip: Play the video in the player.

HighlightEnabled.label: Enable Medal Highlight Command
HighlightEnabled.tooltip: If enabled, users with permission can trigger the medal highlight

HighlightCommandPermission.label: Permission level
HighlightCommandPermission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

HighlightMessage.value: Starting a Medal highlight for $user: Follow them on Medal: $MedalUrl/$user
HighlightMessage.label: Highlight Message

HighlightClipCount.label: Default Clip Count
HighlightClipCount.tooltip: If no clip count is provided, this is the number of clips to play

HighlightPlaybackSpeed.label: Playback Speed
HighlightPlaybackSpeed.tooltip: Set the playback speed of the clips

HighlightVolume.label: Video Volume
HighlightVolume.tooltip: Sets the volume level for the video

HighlightMuteAudio.label: Mute Playback Audio
HighlightMuteAudio.tooltip: Audio will be muted in video playback.

OpenOverlayHighlight.label: Open Highlights Overlay In Browser
OpenOverlayHighlight.tooltip: Open overlay in browser to test

EnableTwitchClipAutoImport.label: Enable Twitch Clip Auto Import
EnableTwitchClipAutoImport.tooltip: Automatically imports a recently created clip from Twitch to Medal

TwitchClientId.label: Twitch App Client ID
TwitchClientId.tooltip: Twitch App Client ID used for polling for new clips.

OpenTwitchRegisterApplication.label: Get your Twitch Client ID here
OpenTwitchRegisterApplication.tooltip: Click here to go to the Twitch and create a App Client ID

TwitchClipPollRate.label: Poll Rate (minutes)
TwitchClipPollRate.tooltip: The rate to poll for new clips in minutes.

TwitchClipMedalPrivacy.label: Video Privacy
TwitchClipMedalPrivacy.tooltip: The privacy level of the imported clip.

WebPort.label: Video Web Port
WebPort.tooltip: The port used by tinyweb. Used for the overlay to request the clips.

EnableSendToRemoteListener.label: Enable Sending Medal Hotkey To Remote Machine
EnableSendToRemoteListener.tooltip: Sends the Medal Hotkey to remote machine running the MedalHotkeyListener

RemoteHotkeyListenerAddress.label: Remote PC IP Address
RemoteHotkeyListenerAddress.tooltip: The IP Address of the machine running the MedalHotkeyListener

OpenSetupMedalHotkeyListenerLink.label: Setup MedalHotkeyListener
OpenSetupMedalHotkeyListenerLink.tooltip: Document on setting up the MedalHotkeyListener

OpenDiscordLink.label: JOIN DISCORD
OpenDiscordLink.tooltip: Join Discord for updates and support

UpdateMedalOverlay.label: Check For Updates
UpdateMedalOverlay.tooltip: Check for updates to Medal Overlay
